name: SetPlayerObjectMaterial
notes: Vertex lightning of the object will disappear if material color is changed.
warnings: You MUST use ARGB color format, not RGBA like used in client messages etc.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Replace the texture of a player-object with the texture from another model in the game.
params_title: (playerid, objectid, materialindex, modelid, txdname[], texturename[], materialcolor)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player the object is associated to.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to replace the texture of

params_body.name: materialindex
params_body.description: The material index on the object to change (0 to 15)

params_body.name: modelid
params_body.description: The modelid on which replacement texture is located. Use 0 for alpha. Use -1 to change the material color without altering the existing texture.

params_body.name: txdname
params_body.description: The name of the txd file which contains the replacement texture (use "none" if not required)

params_body.name: texturename
params_body.description: The name of the texture to use as the replacement (use "none" if not required)

params_body.name: materialcolor
params_body.description: The object color to set, as an integer or hex in ARGB format. Using 0 keeps the existing material color.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SetObjectMaterial: Replace the texture of an object with the texture from another model in the game.
